description: Contributing to the development and maintenance of various applications based on Azure, Microsoft SQL, and C# using specialized framework.

projects.name: Call Center Application
projects.description: Developed and optimized a system connecting users with internal teams such as HR, LOD, engineers, and other divisions, ensuring more efficient communication and issue resolution.

projects.name: Mining Workforce Management System
projects.description: Designed and implemented digital forms for workers assigned to mining operations, managing data on compliance, training certifications, and required documentation in accordance with company standards and safety regulations.

projects.name: Global Application
projects.description: Contributed to the development and integration of systems linking PT Freeport Indonesia's operations with a mining company in Canada.

projects.name: Database Management and Query Optimization
projects.description: Ensured system efficiency and reliability through query optimization, database performance tuning, and troubleshooting in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio.

projects.name: System Implementation and Maintenance
projects.description: Collaborated with the MIS Custom Apps team to develop new features, debug applications, and ensure the stability and security of systems used by various divisions within the company.
